about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
Mesmerize the mind with this peaceful immersion filmed for those who love experiencing the earth come to life around you in the morning. You begin in an enchanting wetland environment on a beautiful foggy. Watch as the fog dances across the waters. Moving onward you arrive at a colorful moment in which the fog slowly passes as the sun rises, revealing the valley below. To finalize your retreat, you will find yourself in your own little nook, atop a mountain.

Purpose
Relaxation
Mindfulness
Self Meditation

Length
10:14

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
